extension.name: AL Plugin Facebook Comments for Joomla 2.5/3.0
extension.author: Alex Lopez
extension.description: Thank you for installing the al Facebook comments for Joomla 2.5/3.0, this is a free plugin, please help me keeping it that way just visiting my website www.AlexLopezIT.com often and clicking on the ads. - Gracias por la instalar AL Comentarios Facebook para Joomla 2.5/3.0, este es un plugin gratuito, por favor ayudame a mantenerlo de esa manera, simplemente visita mi sitio web www.AlexLopezIT.com a menudo y haz clic en los anuncios. (v 3.0.1)

field.name: @spacer11
field.label: Facebook comments settings
field.description: General Facebook comments settings

field.name: enable_comments
field.label: Enable Comments Box
field.description: Enable Comments Box

field.name: app_id
field.label: Facebook App ID
field.description: Add the ID of your Facebook application. This value will be used even in the opengraph options for the FB like button. (You must specify your App ID)

field.name: enable_email
field.label: Enable email notifications
field.description: enable this option to receive an email notification per post, (You must provide an email address)

field.name: mail_to
field.label: E-mail address
field.description: An email will be sent to this email address when a new comment is left on a post

field.name: color_scheme
field.label: Facebook color scheme
field.description: The color scheme used by the plugin. Can be 'light' or 'dark'

field.name: comments_width
field.label: Width
field.description: The width (in pixels) of the plugin. The mobile version of the Comments plugin ignores the width parameter, and instead has a fluid width of 100%.

field.name: number_comments
field.label: Number visible posts
field.description: The number of comments to show by default. The minimum value is 1

field.name: idioma
field.label: Select a language
field.description: Set the language for the plugin

field.name: ignore_pagination
field.label: Ignore Pagination
field.description: Put the FB social plugins only at the begin or the end of the article or in every page of the article

field.name: content_tobe_excluded_comments
field.label: Excluded Content
field.description: Type in Content (Article) Id to be excluded with comma

field.name: category_tobe_excluded_comments
field.label: Excluded Categories
field.description: Multiple select the categories that must not use the comment box plugin

field.name: enable_comments_count
field.label: Enable Post Counter
field.description: Enable the counter for the comments posted

field.name: @spacer12
field.label: OpenGraph Options
field.description: OpenGraph Options; this options will be used only on article view.

field.name: enable_admin
field.label: Enable Administration
field.description: Enable Comments Box Administration. (You must specify at least one administrator ID)

field.name: admin_id
field.label: Facebook ID for administrators
field.description: Add the facebook IDs of the person enabled to moderate comments. Separate the uids by comma without spaces. This value will be used even in the opengraph options for the FB like button

field.name: type
field.label: Object type
field.description: Google Facebook Object Types to find out what values can you use here

field.name: defaultimage
field.label: Default image path
field.description: The path of the default image that must be show in the FB link

field.name: description
field.label: Object description
field.description: Object description for the shared link

field.name: enable_like
field.label: Enable Facebook like button
field.description: Enable Facebook like button

field.name: send
field.label: Show Send
field.description: Show send button

field.name: width_like
field.label: Width
field.description: The width of this button, in pixels

field.name: enable_fbshare
field.label: Enable Facebook share
field.description: Enable Facebook share

field.name: share_fbtext
field.label: Facebook share button text
field.description: Facebook share button text

field.description: Pinterest button
